# The \texttt{LatticeKrig} Function

Use \texttt{LatticeKrig} to make all your worries go away.

```{r ToyLatticeKrigFit}
set.seed(31734)
obsX <- runif(100);
obsY <- runif(100);
obsXY <- cbind(obsX, obsY);
obsZ <- sin(2*pi*obsX) * sin(2*pi*obsY) + 0.1*rnorm(100);
kFit <- LatticeKrig(obsXY, obsZ)
surface(kFit)
```
